panels.description:
>sql errors:  监视 SQL Errors, _Total

Errors/sec

>database:    监视大容量复制操作、备份和还原吞吐量以及事务日志活动. _Total.

Write Transactions/sec

Transactions/sec

Log Flush Wait Time

Log Flushes/sec

Log Pool Requests/sec

Log Pool Disk Reads/sec

Log Pool Cache Misses/sec

>locks: 提供了有关各种资源类型的 SQL Server 锁的信息, _Total.

Lock Timeouts/sec

Lock Waits/sec (=0)

Number of Deadlocks/sec (<1)

>latches: 监视称为闩锁的内部 SQL Server 资源锁.

Latch Waits/sec (<10)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND "instance" = 'Total' AND "counter" = 'Errors/sec') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sql_instance" fill(none)

panels.title: Database Activity

panels.description:
>general statistics: 监视服务器范围内的常规活动.

Processes blocked(=0)

Logins/sec

Logouts/sec

Logical/User Connections

>sql statistics: 监视编译和发送到 SQL Server实例的请求类型.

Batch Requests/sec

SQL Compilations/sec (<10% up)

SQL Re-Compilations/sec (<10% up)
panels.title: SQL SERVER Activity

panels.description:
>buffer manager: 监视对磁盘上的数据库页的物理访问.

Page life expectancy

Lazy writes/sec (<20)

Checkpoint pages/sec

Readahead pages/sec

Page lookups/sec

Page reads/sec

Page writes/sec

>access methods: 监视如何访问数据库中的逻辑数据的计数器.

Full Scans/sec 

Index Searches/sec

Page Splits/sec
panels.title: Buffer Manager

panels.description: >memory clerks: 实例中当前处于活动状态的全部内存分配器的集合。
panels.title: Memory Clerks

panels.description: >wait task count: 该等待类型的总等待时间（毫秒）
panels.title: Wait tasks count

panels.description: >wait time ms: 该等待类型的等待数
panels.title: Wait time ms

list.name: instance
list.query: show tag values from sqlserver_performance with key = sql_instance
